name: Panda Run Enless Fun
description:
Panda Run Enless Fun is a free panda running game where you can meet you new best friend and go for a run! Running adventure with funny panda in the subway and desert. Running on the railways you need to avoid crazy trains and deadly obstacles, and you can run the process to collect gold coins.
Features:
Run, jump and have fun with Panda.
Run across the subway or through the desert.
Grind trains with your cool crew.
Colorful and vivid HD graphics.
Paint powered jetpack.
